intro: Experience a unique visual novel with decision-making and over 20 different endings! Survive an ordinary day in the life of a student
description:
Survive a normal day in the life of an ordinary student!
Welcome to this peculiar world where death lurks around every corner! Make the decisions that will make you have a peaceful day or die in a cruel, absurd or surprising way!
Survive in this world where nothing is what it seems and depending on the path you take, you may discover that every decision is important in life and that anything can kill you, even things you thought didn't exist!
Die by Anything features:
-More than 30 endings
-More than 20 deadly decisions
-Deaths depicted in comics
-Several artists have participated in the final scenes.
-Find all the paths to discover more about the world of Die by Anything.
-Selection of scenes to start from wherever you want (as long as you have previously unlocked it).
You'll explode, get your flesh ripped off, die in a bloody zombie apocalypse... We haven't convinced you to play yet?
This game includes disturbing content, so it is not suitable for children or sensitive or impressionable people.
